monsters.name: Steam Golem
monsters.description: A massive mechanical construct powered by a coal-fired steam engine.

attacks.name: Slam
attacks.description: A massive piston-driven fist crashes down!

attacks.name: Steam Blast
attacks.description: Superheated steam erupts! (30-foot cone, DC 18 DEX save for half)

specialAbilities.name: Immutable Form
specialAbilities.description: Immune to any effect that would alter its form.

specialAbilities.name: Boiler Explosion
specialAbilities.description: When reduced to 0 HP, explodes. All within 20 feet take 8d10 fire damage (DC 18 DEX save for half).

specialAbilities.name: Heavy Armor
specialAbilities.description: Resistance to non-magical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

specialAbilities.name: Multiattack
specialAbilities.description: Makes two slam attacks per turn.

flavorText: Steam hisses as a towering golem of iron and brass activates!
The ground shakes with each step of the steam-powered giant!
Industrial might given form - a steam golem attacks!
monsters.defeatedText: The steam golem's boiler ruptures in a final explosion of steam and fire.

monsters.name: Factory Foreman
monsters.description: A brutal overseer commanding workers through fear and industrial weapons.

attacks.name: Revolver
attacks.description: Six shots from a heavy revolver!

specialAbilities.name: Rally Workers
specialAbilities.description: Summons 2d4 factory workers (AC 12, 15 HP each, +4 to hit, 1d6+2 damage).

specialAbilities.name: Intimidating Presence
specialAbilities.description: Creatures within 30 feet have disadvantage on attacks unless DC 16 WIS save succeeds.

specialAbilities.name: Brutal
specialAbilities.description: Critical hits on 19-20.

flavorText: A whistle blares - the foreman demands order through violence!
The overseer's shadow falls over you, hammer raised!
Back to work! The brutal foreman attacks!
monsters.defeatedText: The foreman's whistle falls silent as they collapse.

monsters.name: Soot Elemental
monsters.description: A living manifestation of industrial pollution and toxic smoke.

specialAbilities.name: Smoke Form
specialAbilities.description: Can become gaseous, gaining resistance to all damage and ability to move through small spaces.

specialAbilities.name: Pollution Aura
specialAbilities.description: Creatures within 15 feet take 2d6 poison damage at start of their turn.

specialAbilities.name: Obscuring Presence
specialAbilities.description: Area within 20 feet is lightly obscured.

flavorText: Black smoke coalesces into a vaguely humanoid form!
The stench of factories given life - a soot elemental!
Industrial waste becomes a living nightmare!
monsters.defeatedText: The elemental dissipates into harmless smoke.

monsters.name: Locomotive Behemoth
monsters.description: A possessed or runaway train engine, unstoppable and deadly.

attacks.name: Crushing Charge
attacks.description: The locomotive charges! (Target knocked prone on hit, DC 20 STR save to avoid)

attacks.name: Steam Blast
attacks.description: Superheated steam erupts from the smokestack! (40-foot line, DC 19 DEX save for half)

specialAbilities.name: Unstoppable
specialAbilities.description: Cannot be grappled, restrained, or knocked prone. Ignores difficult terrain.

specialAbilities.name: Momentum
specialAbilities.description: Gains +2 to damage for each consecutive turn spent moving (max +10).

specialAbilities.name: Heavy Armor
specialAbilities.description: Resistance to non-magical damage.

flavorText: The shriek of a steam whistle - a runaway locomotive!
Steel and steam combine in unstoppable fury!
All aboard the train to destruction!
monsters.defeatedText: The locomotive derails in a catastrophic crash of metal and steam.

monsters.name: Saboteur
monsters.description: A radical or spy skilled in explosives and industrial destruction.

attacks.name: Dynamite
attacks.description: Throws dynamite stick! (15-foot radius, DC 16 DEX save for half)

attacks.name: Wrench
attacks.description: A heavy wrench swings in close combat!

specialAbilities.name: Sabotage
specialAbilities.description: Can disable or destroy machinery within 5 feet as action (DC 18 INT check to resist).

specialAbilities.name: Evasion
specialAbilities.description: Takes no damage on successful DEX save, half on failure.

specialAbilities.name: Cunning Action
specialAbilities.description: Can Dash, Disengage, or Hide as bonus action.

flavorText: A figure in worker's clothes lights a fuse!
The saboteur grins as explosives are readied!
One person's terrorist is another's freedom fighter!
monsters.defeatedText: The saboteur's final explosive fails to detonate as they fall.

monsters.name: Iron Baron
monsters.description: A ruthless industrialist backed by wealth, influence, and hired guns.

specialAbilities.name: Hire Mercenaries
specialAbilities.description: Summons 3 bodyguards (AC 15, 30 HP each, +6 to hit, 2d6+2 damage).

specialAbilities.name: Bribe
specialAbilities.description: Target makes DC 18 WIS save or is charmed for 1 minute.

specialAbilities.name: Monopoly
specialAbilities.description: Allies gain +2 to all rolls while within 30 feet.

flavorText: A baron in fine clothes sneers from behind hired protection!
Money talks - and this industrialist has plenty!
The rich get richer, and you're in the way!
monsters.defeatedText: The baron's empire crumbles as they fall, gold scattering.

monsters.name: Gatling Gun Crew
monsters.description: Soldiers operating an early machine gun with devastating firepower.

attacks.name: Gatling Gun
attacks.description: Rapid-fire bullets spray death! (Attacks all targets in 40-foot cone)

specialAbilities.name: Crew
specialAbilities.description: Represents 2-3 soldiers. When reduced below 70 HP, loses multiattack capability.

specialAbilities.name: Suppressive Fire
specialAbilities.description: Targets hit must succeed DC 15 WIS save or have disadvantage on attacks next turn.

flavorText: The crank turns - a gatling gun opens fire!
Brass casings rain down as the machine gun roars!
The industrial age brings industrial death!
monsters.defeatedText: The gun crew falls, their weapon falling silent.
